channel.title: Tikz on Random Determinism
channel.description: Recent content in Tikz on Random Determinism

item.title: Comparing the speed of Metapost and TikZ
item.description: As a frequent user of both Metapost and TikZ, I often observe that TikZ is considerably slower than Metapost. But what’s the actual difference in speed? Let’s consider basic operations: drawing straight lines and drawing circles.
